analysis.description:
Reentrancy in KickcityAbstractCrowdsale.processContribution (/unique_contracts/0x9fbd7908b1f8daa833d9c2d0ec07573de9e7ce76.sol#514-537):
	External calls:
	- token.issue(msg.sender,kicks) (/unique_contracts/0x9fbd7908b1f8daa833d9c2d0ec07573de9e7ce76.sol#533)
	External calls sending eth:
	- kickcityWallet.transfer(contribution) (/unique_contracts/0x9fbd7908b1f8daa833d9c2d0ec07573de9e7ce76.sol#533)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- etherCollected (/unique_contracts/0x9fbd7908b1f8daa833d9c2d0ec07573de9e7ce76.sol#533-535)

ERC20Token.standard should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x9fbd7908b1f8daa833d9c2d0ec07573de9e7ce76.sol#89-90)
KickcityAbstractCrowdsale.maxGasPrice should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x9fbd7908b1f8daa833d9c2d0ec07573de9e7ce76.sol#492)
